movie.title: North Face
movie.plot: Based on a true story, North Face is a suspenseful adventure film about a competition to climb the most dangerous rock face in the Alps. Set in 1936, as Nazi propaganda urges the nation's Alpinists to conquer the unclimbed north face of the Swiss massif - the Eiger - two reluctant German climbers begin their daring ascent.

events.title: Andreas Hinterstoisser, Willy Angerer and Edi Rainer die while trying to climb the Eiger
after a gruelling night, Toni Kurz dies two metres from being saved
